name: True Knight RPG game
description:
Controls: Use the touch screen to control your knight, and touch with 2 finger to open the meni, go back and close it.
This i my first game ever, and a RPG at that, made for a No Travel Game Jam, but I will try to work on it and update it in the future, as it only has a couple of quests and it is a short game, but you can explore and try weapons and skills as you please. Background: You play as a young hero, who is in fact a brave and honorable knight, blessed with magical powers.. Your mission is to help villagers and defeat the Beast boss Minotaur and his minions...

Also, please note that this was made in about 2 days..so I hope I get some tips so I can improve and sharpen my game dev. Thank you all! I hope you ENJOY and keep safe!
